snippet.title: Randamn (Apple II - Magnum software)
snippet.description:
Randamn (http://gue.cgwmuseum.org/galleries/index.php?pub=1&item) was an action game published by Magnum software in 1983 for the Apple ][. The player needs to defeat randomly selected enemies in 7 worlds to become the Demi-god "Randamn".

It took me a while to figure out the game because the character won't move unless you hold button #0. That said, I couldn't even completed the first world.

Credits:
Cover art - gue.cgwmuseum.org
